title: FEK Tournament: Nemesis Draft - Info, Teams, and Stream
body:
http://i.imgur.com/DAUV2eu.png

#[RULES](http://tundrafizz.com/fek/fekevents/tournamentrules.html)

##Tournament Explanation

* Nemesis Draft is where the enemy team picks your champions for you out of your 25 Champions selected.
* Team Captain on the enemy team will pick your Champions for your team BEFORE going into Champion Select.
* Champion Select will take place in Tournament Draft where random Champions not previously picked will be banned (for the purpose of using the Pause functionality).
* We’ll be doing Bo3 Elimination where the finals will be a best of 3.
* Once you use the Champion once; that Champion will not be able to be picked for you again.


--

##Date & Schedule

* Day 1 - April 1st, Friday | 6PM PST / 9PM EST
	* Quarters Group A: 2 Bo3s
* Day 2 - April 2nd, Saturday | 6PM PST / 9PM EST
	* Quarters Group B: 2 Bo3s
* Day 3 - April 8th, Friday | 6PM PST / 9PM EST
	* Semis Group A & B: 2 Bo3s
* Day 4 - April 9th, Saturday | 6PM PST / 9PM EST
	* Finals: Bo3

--

##Stream
http://www.twitch.tv/fekevents

**Shoutcasters**
-Challenger Nid (Streamer)
-Vei
-Drift God
-Airman CompSci
-Kayoten
-Frigid Vengeance

--

#[Teams](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eRWQPP8D0hmquVadHG2acm3Kiu5PCOG9ureuEnOI7tY/edit?usp=sharing)

--

##Prizes
1st Place: 1000RP(Riot), Mystery Icon(Riot), Triumphant Ryze(Riot), $10 RP(FEK), Temp FEK Badge(FEK), and 30 Fish Chips(FEK).
-
2nd Place: 500RP(Riot), Mystery Icon(Riot), $5 RP(FEK), Temp FEK Badge(FEK), and 20 Fish Chips(FEK).
-
3rd & 4th Place: Mystery Icon

--

##Questions?
If you have a question contact us in one of these spots:

* This Thread
* LoL Client
* Discord: https://discord.gg/0oTUeT7TipDHYxTn

**[Click here to learn more about FEK](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/3V6I7JvK)**

replies.body: Laughing Fish is not on M&G. What blasphemy is this.
He was on it at first when we made the team names.
https://38.media.tumblr.com/b30af76d1ff23e25bd98cca7f8be588f/tumblr_inline_niwn4it21A1qfwhgs.gif
the legend
Nah, he might be just **short** of it.
Je b yrvjj5f4uybdjtn egg jiutf by vjebuy dc NH

I'm laughing at this even tho I don't understand the joke XD all I saw one post was Laughing and Airman saying **short** with a vei: flipping table gif here

I'm interested in what happened XD did vei become veigar or something, better call superb villain if that's the case

Yeah, we essentially just made Vei (who mains veigar, hence his name) practically veigar because I would come up with (or read from twitch chat) short jokes. It just drove him mad. 

So when I made the short joke disccusion where he flipped the table, it pretty shows his reaction because of the fact that he had enough with jokes.

The funny part is that he has grown to accept them and now has *higher* expectations for them. Kek.

nah, that was only a 1week window for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Explorer Ezreal,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ANtnhRTh,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-03-29T00:24:01.704+0000)

Can I sub?
Sorry, had to sign up in the time that was given to sign up. Those are closed now.
So what will be the fate of fek tourneys with Riots announced discontinued support of online tourneys? I've really enjoyed this one and would be willing to assist in ensuring that more are to come.
They'll still continue with or without riot support.
I'm glad, this was really enjoyable

Question: Can we switch champions with teammates in champ select as long as we both had the champions in our 25 pool? For example say I had Teemo, and another teammate had Braum, but we both selected those champions in sign ups, can we switch and play those instead?

Asking since old Nemesis Draft allowed you to switch with teammates.
I want to say no, but it's something the team cam discuss.
I think no would be a better option. I think the whole point of nemesis draft is getting stuck with what was picked for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Explorer Ezreal,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ANtnhRTh,comment-id=00160000,timestamp=2016-03-30T06:49:10.338+0000)
>
> I want to say no, but it's something the team cam discuss.

I know I'm no staff, but I think no would be better overall. Seems more fun to me to just go with what you get. Kinda like ARAM without the rerolling and constant dodging :P

Gj TSM and congratz!

But please next time don't lie about something next time. I can understand my message could be taken wrongly (and I realized it after I said it). But please don't lie that I spammed all chat with it ;_;. Caused a bunch of drama that not only extended wait time, but now got trouble irl due to it.

Regardless, congratulations.

> [{quoted}](name=laughup02,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ANtnhRTh,comment-id=002f,timestamp=2016-04-10T04:50:15.574+0000)

> 
> Regardless, congratulations.

The events that transpired irked me immensely, and I'm sorry you had to go through that. I wish I spoke my case more to change how things went.

Hoping in the future people that sign up, show up. Missing people and dcs really made the first two series fruatrating to watch (and more so play). 

Took a lot of the fun out of it (that and rude/salty teammates).

*Sigh* of course I had to fight the best team first round.

Really wish I ended up in group A.

Was fun guys. You should do this more often :v
group A had the winning team though. Really had several good teams that made it interesting (even though had a LOT of no shows)

Yeah, but still, it felt like in the first few games it was more appropriate for my skill level :s

The match I was in was waayyy too much for me too handle. I screwed up so bad as Bard man.
When will the shoutcasters for next week be announced?
Oh i figured bfna would tell you guys. Kayoten and you got the spots.

Don't make too many short jokes. We went a little far last time.
http://images.japemonster.com/2012/03/funny-gifs-sometimes-you-just-gotta-dance.gif
Only a little. I think we were just short of it being too much.
So excited about tomorrow! This should be lots and lots of fun >w<... I at least hope to win one game '.w.

Yeah, you don't want to be too serious about this tournament, right?

:P

what's fek rp?
It's just RP provided by FEK. Tundra Fizz should be adding you to give you the RP sometime this week.
